name: 2018/11/02 Lunch Vegetables
description: This low-carb, high-fiber lunch featuring steamed vegetables, enoki mushrooms, tender eggplant, crisp capsicum, and rich tomato puree is not only a healthy choice but also aligns with Healthyfied Recipes. It's designed to nourish your body while satisfying your cravings for a wholesome meal.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare all vegetables: wash and cut the eggplant into slices, trim the ends off the enoki mushrooms, and dice the capsicum.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Steam the 400g of vegetables until fully cooked and tender, about 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: While the vegetables are steaming, season them with 0.25 teaspoon of salt and a quarter teaspoon of ground pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Once the vegetables are steamed, transfer them to a large bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the 3 tablespoons of tomato puree to the steamed vegetables. Mix well to ensure all the vegetables are coated evenly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
